name: Next.js Route Handler CORS preflight 最小
description: OPTIONS で簡易CORS応答を返す最小例

files.template:
export async function OPTIONS(){ return new Response(null, { headers: { 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*', 'Access-Control-Allow-Methods': 'GET,POST,PUT,DELETE,OPTIONS', 'Access-Control-Allow-Headers': 'content-type' } }); }
export async function GET(){ return new Response('ok', { headers: { 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*' } }); }
